commit.message:
scripted-diff: replace clientInterface with m_client_interface in net

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-

sed -i -e "s/clientInterface/m_client_interface/g" src/net.cpp src/net.h

-END VERIFY SCRIPT-
